attributes.action: STOP the increase on food prices around london! Families are suffering.
attributes.additional_details: every single privately owned supermarket/Vegetable markets around the UK has increased their prices by 3x. Butchers are selling 1 whole chicken for £6.99 and Meat per Kg £18. Vegetable markets are selling for £3,99 per bowl and it was £1 before. Families can’t afford these prices and its causing a big problem. If you don’t want the people of London to start a protest again parliament/government for not doing anything, then help us.
attributes.background: Investigate and put a stop to local supermarkets and any other small businesses from overpricing on essential foods and household goods!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
